events.message: I received my order last week, but the item was not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back due to dissatisfaction with the delivered item.
The case was assigned to agent Jane D. for processing the refund request and further communication with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear the item didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund correctly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing the item. It clearly does not match what was described on the website.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect.
Thanks for the quick response and refund process. I appreciate your help resolving this issue efficiently.
The refund case has been marked as resolved following the customer's confirmation and processing of the refund.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
The refund case has been formally closed due to resolution confirmation from the customer and no further issues reported.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their experience with the refund process.
